20020521

I got then following restarting the workbench. I saw a dialog telling me that 
the workbench state could not be recreated.
On shutdown I had several .class and .java files open in the java perspective.
The install/update perspective was the current perspective.
I will try to get a reproducable case.

1) Close all perspectives
2) Open Java perspective
3) Open .java file
4) Open .class file
5) Open Install/Update perspective
6) Expand Current Configuration
7) Expand file:...
8) Select Eclipse Platform 2.0.0
9) Close workbench
10 Start workbench

Problem occured because the editor control and thus the action groups have not 
yet been created as the java editor is not the topmost editor. Introduced guard.
Build F2.

With the scenario above I get an error message while strarting up:
"Unable to read workbench state. Workbench Ui will be reset."

and then in the log:

I get the same NPE:
